member.name: T:wslib.Security.Pbkdf2Service
member.summary: Implements Rfc2898DerivedBytes for hashing a password.

member.name: M:wslib.Security.Pbkdf2Service.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new Instance of Pbkdf2Service with default values. Saltsize = 8 bytes. Hashsize = 128 bit. Iterations = 10000.

member.summary: Initializes a new Instance of Pbkdf2Service with default values. Saltsize = 8 bytes. Iterations = 10000.
member.param: The size of the Hash it bit.

member.param: The size of Salt in bytes

member.name: P:wslib.Security.Pbkdf2Service.HashSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the Hash size in bits.

member.name: P:wslib.Security.Pbkdf2Service.Iterations
member.summary: Gets or sets the Iterations. Minimum is 10000.
